title: Sports Teams Will Score Big Savings, Prime Location When Booking Courtyard Philadelphia Devon
text:
Courtyard Philadelphia Devon
Hotel near Devon, PA, offers comfortable accommodations for groups traveling with coaches, fans, parents
WAYNE, Pa. , Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- This fall, youth sports teams and their entourages traveling to Wayne, PA for games and tournaments will score big when they discover the comfortable and affordable accommodations at Courtyard Philadelphia Devon .
One of the premier hotels in Wayne, PA , Courtyard invites coaches, fans and families to enjoy all of the conveniences of home while saving money. Sport groups that book 10 or more rooms by Dec. 31, 2015 will receive 5,000 Marriott Rewards points per night stay, making traveling as a large team less taxing. Featuring a large number of double-occupancy guest rooms, teammates and families can share spacious accommodations and save. Visitors also will cheer about complimentary Wi-Fi and free parking at the hotel in Devon, PA.
Knowing the importance location plays in planning a trip, Courtyard Philadelphia Devon offers youth sports players and their supporters easy access to multiple colleges, universities and sporting venues nearby including YSC Sports (2.9 miles), Berwyn Squash and Fitness Club (3.1 miles), Cabrini College (3.1 miles), Upper Main Line YMCA (3.2 miles), Villanova University (4.1 miles), Episcopal Academy (4.3 miles), Competitive Edge Sports (5.1 miles), Haverford College (6.5 miles), Marple Sports Arena (10.5 miles), Oaks Center Ice (10.9 miles), Greater Philadelphia Expo Center (11 miles) and United Sports (22.2 miles).
Teams and their supporters can fuel up before or after a big game with a variety of healthy and hearty breakfast choices and specialty Starbucks beverages at The Bistro â€“ Eat. Drink. Connect. Conveniently located in the lobby of the Devon, PA , hotel, The Bistro also serves numerous dinner and cocktail options, making the inviting atmosphere an ideal spot for celebrating and unwinding after a long day.
Travelers with a mid-day or late-night craving can take advantage of the 24-hour Market in the hotel's lobby. Snacks, beverages and other grab-and-go conveniences are easily accessible, reducing guests' need to leave the hotel in Wayne , PA.
Visitors looking to keep on an exercise routine even while away from home can head to the well-equipped fitness center, featuring a variety of cardiovascular equipment and free weights. Guests of all ages will find a pleasant escape when they take a dip in the indoor pool, open year-round with towels provided.
Sports travelers interested in booking 10 or more rooms should contact Rebecca Kammeyer for more details at rebecca.kammeyer@marriott.com or 1-610-687-6633. Points will be awarded to only one Marriott Rewards member per stay with a maximum of 10,000 earned per visit through March 31, 2016 .
About Courtyard Philadelphia Devon
Courtyard Philadelphia Devon at 762 W. Lancaster Ave. in Wayne, PA , is near Villanova University , Valley Forge Convention Center and the famous King of Prussia Mall. One of the premiere hotels in Wayne, PA , the Devon Courtyard features three floors, 137 rooms, 12 suites and two meeting rooms with 1,250 square feet of flexible event space. The Bistro - Eat. Drink. Connect, a fitness center, indoor pool and complimentary Wi-Fi are among the many amenities available. For information, visit www.CourtyardDevonSports.com or call 1-610-687-6633.
